item.title: Wow this is wierd
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Source: Delta

Well i spawned a zombie and noticed it was total stretched and ruined. So after a ton of debugging and stuff, I found out if i take my block animation out for my godswords it fixes it. Now I need the block anim for the godsword but everytime i add it it screws up the zombie.

If anyone can atleast tell me why my block anim has anything to do with the zombie, that would be helpful

Additional details:

Found in Class 20:

if(j == 301) { int file = 1834; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] frames = {116,117,118,119,120,121,122,123,124,125,126,127,128,129,130,131,132,133,134,135}; aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++) { aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+FrameStart[file]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[i2] = 0; } }
